sentence: “Meanwhile, Tim Ryan is just plugging along.” The four candidates in the MAGA lane are essentially devoting time and resources to an entirely separate primary contest, said one D.C. operative with deep ties to the state: “Whatever the hell is going on at Mar-a-Lago… who’s down there, who’s meeting with Trump, here’s why you shouldn’t pick J.D., or Jane, or Josh, or Mike.” The one Republican candidate who is not playing in the Mar-a-Lago primary is Dolan, the state senator whose family owns the Cleveland Guardians baseball team.
